divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard star watching when I looked to the North-west, and saw a bright orange object headed south, at first I didn't know what it was because I could hear a faint noise and thought it might be a plane. As the object came closer I notice a plane quite a bit behind the object, and that was where the noise was comming from, as the orange object came closer it looked like a pill then a egg it was more narrow and almost transparent, it was darker towards the middle of the object and bright orange at the top and bottom and I could not hear any noise from the object. I belive the time was about 6pm, not quite sure and it just headed South-west. The plane was not following it.That was about 15 to 25 secounds and the object was gone.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Modesto
There was one other sighting in Modesto on or around November 9th 2007
Summary: Object moving from North to south orange in color almost trasparent no noise
